title: Colonial America in the eighteenth century
brief_description: Describes life in America in the 75 years preceding the Revolutionary War. Discusses the evolution of the American political system, laws, social customs and economic system. Suitable for secondary level.
description: Describes life in America in the 75 years preceding the Revolutionary War. Discusses the evolution of the American political system, laws, social customs and economic system. Suitable for secondary level.
